snippet: Tony Gallopin took the overall lead in the Paris-Nice race with a victory in the penultimate stage, pulling away from the previous leader, Michal Kwiatkowski.
abstract: Tony Gallopin wins penultimage stage to take overall lead in Paris-Nice bicycle race.
lead_paragraph: Tony Gallopin took the overall lead in the Paris-Nice race with a victory in the penultimate stage, pulling away from the previous leader, Michal Kwiatkowski.
